query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Al tornar de la mente, che si chiuse 2 dinanzi a la pietà d’i due cognati, 3 che di trestizia tutto mi confuse,
query.error: **English:** 1 When my mind returned, which had closed 2 before the pity of the two relatives, 3 which confused me all with sadness,
query.result: 1 Ketika pikiranku kembali, yang telah tertutup 2 di hadapan belas kasihan kedua saudara itu, 3 yang membuatku bingung dengan kesedihan,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 novi tormenti e novi tormentati 5 mi veggio intorno, come ch’io mi mova 6 e ch’io mi volga, e come che io guati.
query.error: **English:** 4 new torments and new tormented people 5 I see around me, no matter how I move 6 and how I turn, and no matter how I look.
query.result: 4 siksaan baru dan orang-orang yang tersiksa baru 5 kulihat di sekitarku, tidak peduli bagaimana aku bergerak 6 dan bagaimana aku berbalik, dan tidak peduli bagaimana aku melihat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Io sono al terzo cerchio, de la piova 8 etterna, maladetta, fredda e greve; 9 regola e qualità mai non l’è nova.
query.error: **English:** 7 I am in the third circle, of the rain 8 eternal, cursed, cold and heavy; 9 rule and quality are never new to it.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Grandine grossa, acqua tinta e neve 11 per l’aere tenebroso si riversa; 12 pute la terra che questo riceve.
query.error: **English:** 10 Large hail, dark water, and snow 11 pour down through the darkened air; 12 the earth stinks as it receives this.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Cerbero, fiera crudele e diversa, 14 con tre gole caninamente latra 15 sovra la gente che quivi è sommersa.
query.error: **English:** 13 Cerberus, a cruel and diverse beast, 14 with three canine throats barks 15 over the people who are submerged here.
query.result: 13 Cerberus, binatang buas yang kejam dan berbeda, 14 dengan tiga tenggorokan anjing menggonggong 15 ke atas orang-orang yang tenggelam di sini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Li occhi ha vermigli, la barba unta e atra, 17 e ’l ventre largo, e unghiate le mani; 18 graffia li spirti ed iscoia ed isquatra.
query.error: **English:** 16 His eyes are red, his beard is greasy and black, 17 and his belly is large, and his hands are clawed; 18 he scratches the spirits and flays and quarters them.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 22 When Cerberus, the great worm, saw us, 23 he opened his mouths and showed us his fangs; 24 he had no limb that he could keep still.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 25 And my guide stretched out his hands, 26 took some earth, and with his fists full 27 threw it into the greedy reeds.
query.result: 25 Dan pemanduku merentangkan tangannya, 26 mengambil tanah, dan dengan kepalan tangannya yang penuh 27 melemparkannya ke dalam alang-alang yang rakus.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 28 Seperti anjing yang menggonggong dengan penuh keinginan, 29 dan kemudian terdiam setelah menggigit makanannya, 30 karena ia hanya berniat dan berusaha untuk melahapnya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 cotai si fecer quelle facce lorde 32 de lo demonio Cerbero, che ’ntrona 33 l’anime sì, ch’esser vorrebber sorde.

query.result: 31 begitulah wajah-wajah kotor itu 32 dari iblis Cerberus, yang membuat tuli 33 jiwa-jiwa sehingga mereka ingin menjadi tuli.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 «O tu che se’ per questo ’nferno tratto», 41 mi disse, «riconoscimi, se sai: 42 tu fosti, prima ch’io disfatto, fatto».
query.error: **English:** 40 "O you who are drawn to this hell," 41 he said to me, "recognize me, if you can: 42 you were created before I was undone."
query.result: 40 "Wahai kamu yang dibawa ke neraka ini," 41 katanya kepadaku, "kenali aku, jika kamu tahu: 42 kamu ada, sebelum aku dihancurkan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 43 Dan aku kepadanya: "Penderitaan yang kamu alami 44 mungkin menarikmu keluar dari pikiranku, 45 sehingga tidak tampak bahwa aku pernah melihatmu.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 52 Kalian penduduk kota memanggilku Ciacco: 53 karena dosa kerakusan yang merugikan, 54 seperti yang kau lihat, aku melemah dalam hujan.
